page.title: 10Life Styles
page.content: The Roman Catholic Church built in the 194O has 3 services each week with an average congregation of 1OO. Rev. Michael Mahon is the Priest-in-Charge In 1981 a Church Hall was built which is used for Church Social activities and by the local Peace Group. A local bus service runs on Wednesday and Friday to the shopping area and to Newbury on Thursday. A service to and from Swindon operates Monday,Wednesday and Friday. From the register of voters, February 1985 the approximate number of persons eligible to vote was 1,357 plus an estimated 5/6OO under 17. A large proportion of the adult population are retired and have come from other towns. There is a good balance of Artisan and Professional people.
